# Draft:Revolutionary Military Council of Hasaka

| allegiance =  Free Syrian Army
| headquarters = Hasakah Governorate
| opponents = Syrian Democratic Forces
| war =
* Syrian civil war
** Al-Hasakah Governorate campaign (2012–2014)
*** Battle of Ras al-Ayn (2012–13)
}}
The Revolutionary Military Council of Hasaka () was a militant organization in the Hasakah Governorate.
History
In August 2012, 6 military officers who defected from the Syrian Armed Forces, led by Colonel Hassan al-Abdullah, announced the formation of the Revolutionary Military Council in Hasakah Governorate, part of the Free Syrian Army against the Syrian Democratic Forces.
Groups
* Liwa Ahfath ar-Rasul
* Katibat Ahrar Gouran
* Liwa al-Nasser
References
